column2:
"Hey, look who it is! Are you here on a mission?
The usual exploration stuff? Heh heh, me too."

"I finally got clearance to check out a bunch of
new places! I feel like I finally hit the starting
line for real on my search."

"Do I need help? Aw, don't worry about it. It's not
like I've got any leads anyway. I'll just wander
around, and if I find anything, hey, bonus!"

"That doesn't mean I'm not serious about this,
though. I've just decided to do it on my own.
Look my own way."

"That'll make it that much sweeter when I finally
hit the jackpot, don't you think?"

"Heh, anyway... Thanks for the offer, partner. If I
run into any trouble, you're the first one I'll call."
"For now, I'll see you later. You be good!"

"おっ、相棒じゃんか！
お前も探索か何かか？
へへ、おれもそんなところだよ。"

"やーっといろんなところに
行けるようになってきたからな。
ここからおれの本当の始まり！"

"手伝い？　いーよいーよ、そういうの。
正直、アテのない探しものだしな。
見つかったらもうけもん、程度！"

"もちろん、諦めてるわけじゃねえよ？
見つける気はマンマン。
おれの手で見つけ出したい、ってだけ。"

"だってなんつーか、そのほうが
感動的だと思わねえ？"

"……なーんてな。
ま、気遣ってくれてありがとよ相棒。
困ったら真っ先に連絡するからさ！"
